price: But whoever retaliates after being wronged, there is no blame on them.
arabic: وَلَمَنِ ٱنتَصَرَ بَعۡدَ ظُلۡمِهِۦ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَا عَلَيۡهِم مِّن سَبِيلٍ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
